stories.text:
Lately I've been receiving a lot of spam phone calls. Being an engineer I started thinking about how to solve the problem and avoid wasting time and/or being scammed.

I thought there ought to exist a list of annoying phone numbers like those that have been created for malicious/advertising domains but I could not find any.

Why is it so that nobody thought of it? Am I missing something important here?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why there's no crowdsourced phone number blocklist?

stories.text:
For years anxiety/fear-avoidance cycle defined my life. I tend to procrastinate to a such extent that causes problems in my day to day functioning, and generally my life.

For example, i have to submit 2 fairly simple assignments, in 2 and 3 days respectively. If i don't pass the next 4 assignments i will fail the lab, but i keep avoiding sitting down with all of my power. I feel pure fear and a sense of "i will certainly fail if i try".

The above example is with these assignments, but this type of behavior extends to everything in my life.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to break anxiety/fear-avoidance cycle?

stories.text: The Netgear router is the world's fastest wireless router to use for business, professional and personal purposes. This organization provides wired and wireless networking support for broadband service. Netgear provides services for customers. It provides assistance in resolving the problems encountered during the services and all the issues related to them. It's not easy to contact Netgear directly. We are a third-party organization that provides our services 24*7 to the users. If you encounter an issue related to Netgear Services, you can get your issue resolved at any time by contacting Netgear Router Support Phone Number +1-888-226-0555
stories.title: Netgear Router Support Phone Number and1-888-226-0555
